abstract: Google’s philanthropic arm is investing in two geothermal companies, while also providing a grant to Southern Methodist University to further study renewable energy bubbling from below the earth’s surface.
snippet: Google’s philanthropic arm is investing in two geothermal companies, while also providing a grant to Southern Methodist University to further study renewable energy bubbling from below the earth’s surface.
